name: Dheeraj Saraswat
title: Frontend Web Developer
bio: Front-End Developer crafting scalable, high-performance UIs that delight users. I turn designs into interactive experiences and optimize every pixel for impact.
longBio: I'm a Front-End Developer specializing in building scalable, high-performance user interfaces using React.js, Next.js, Redux, and Tailwind CSS. I focus on turning complex designs into interactive, responsive, and maintainable web applications. I have delivered client projects like Litt.law and Legal Wires, integrating real-time collaboration, AI features, and performance optimizations for thousands of users. When not shipping production code, I experiment with new web technologies, optimize UIs for speed and accessibility, and take on challenging side projects to push my skills further. I believe in writing clean, efficient code, creating delightful user experiences, and continuously learning from every project.
headline: From prototypes to production: scalable UIs are my playground.
